How do I return a product if I bought it online?

To return an online purchase, please contact our customer service for a return authorization. Pack the item in its original packaging and ship it back to us using the label provided. Weâ€™ll process your return once the item is received.

What are your store hours on Saturdays?
On Saturdays, our store opens at 10:00 AM and closes at 6:00 PM.

Can I return an item bought with a gift card?
Yes, items purchased with a gift card can be returned. If you return an item, the refund will be issued back to a gift card or store credit.

Do you have a price matching policy?
Yes, we offer a price matching policy. If you find a lower price on the same item at a competitor, bring proof of the lower price to our store, and we will match it.

What should I do if my product is damaged upon delivery?
If your product is damaged upon delivery, please contact our customer service immediately with your order number and photos of the damage. We will arrange for a replacement or a refund.

Are there any limitations on how long I can use a store credit?
Store credits are generally valid for one year from the date of issue. Please check the terms on your credit or contact our customer service for specific details.

How can I sign up for your loyalty program?
You can sign up for our loyalty program in-store or on our website. Just provide your email address and some basic information to start earning rewards on your purchases.

Do you offer home delivery for online orders?
Yes, we offer home delivery for online orders. You can select the delivery option at checkout and choose a delivery date that works best for you.

Can I cancel my order after it has been placed?

Once an order is placed, it is processed quickly, so cancellations are generally not possible. However, you can contact our customer service immediately after placing your order to check if a cancellation is feasible.

Do you offer free gift wrapping services?
Yes, we offer free gift wrapping for all purchases. Just let us know at checkout if you would like your items gift-wrapped.
